title: Account Bugged and not being able to create thread.
body: I'm stuck with the notice saying i can't post thread before level 7 but i'm level 20... so what should i do?

replies.body:
Wolfess with the assist! {{summoner:31}} 

Just like Wolfess said, sometimes it can take a bit for your profiles to sync up with each other. Once you posted here, it forced those levels to sync up with each other, and now we're seeing you as level 20!
